alert.note: Alert for Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:03PM PST until January 18 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5-10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Highway 140 near Lake of The Woods, highway 62 north of Union Creek, highways`s 230, and 138 east of near Diamond Lake, and foothills in eastern Douglas County, mainly above 3000 feet. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could exceed one inch per hour between noon and 4 pm pdt Wednesday. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com or http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades
